New Records: Varun Chakravarthy and Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets apiece
Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya smashed 39 runs off 16 deliveries
Suryakumar Yadav scored 58 runs off 31 deliveries
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 14 runs
Varun Chakravarthy took 3 wickets for 15 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav: We'll look to bowl first
Najmul Hossain Shanto: It's a pretty new side
Suryakumar Yadav: We have to nurture players like Mayank, he is a special talent
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav: The way the guys showed character playing on a new ground and the way we batted, it was great
Najmul Hossain Shanto: We didn't start well, we need to do proper plan in the next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The newly-constructed Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium in Gwalior will host its first international match on Sunday, when India plays Bangladesh in a T20 match
